SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, GameViewActions, MainViewActions, Serializable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIHandler, SocketClientHandler
public abstract class Client extends Object implements Observer, MainViewActions, GameViewActions
This abstract class represents a client connection in the server. It implements Observer so that it can be used to notify the updates to the clients. It implents MainViewActions and GameViewActions so that it can perform client actions.

    • setDisconnectionStatus

      public final void setDisconnectionStatus()
      This is a helper method that accordingly to the previous state of the connection sets the new one. This function is called when a client results disconnected.
